<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>tab3showVerticalABreakdown</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    try {
        // Get the breakdownSysid
        var breakdownSysid = api.data.getmetricsofciodashboard.output.VerticalA.headlineMetrics[0].breakdownSysid;

        // Fetch data using the breakdownSysid
        const response = await fetch(`/api/now/pa/scorecards?breakdownSysid=${breakdownSysid}`);
        
        if (!response.ok) {
            throw new Error('Failed to fetch data');
        }

        // Parse the response JSON
        const data = await response.json();

        // Update the client state directly using setState
        api.setState({ "tab3verticalAShowBreakdown", data });

    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error in handler:', error);
    }
}



]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-20 15:25:14</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>514db4201b973150dba1c3e5464bcb55</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tab3showVerticalABreakdown</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_514db4201b973150dba1c3e5464bcb55</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-20 16:51:31</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>18c885d7e4c0000001</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_514db4201b973150dba1c3e5464bcb55</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-20 17:54:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>ed7f1d681bdb3150dba1c3e5464bcb6a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-20 17:54:37</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
